title: Binance Overhauls Stablecoin Trading with Trump-Linked USD1
contentSnippet: The exchange is adding new USD1 trading pairs and replaces BUSD collateral with the token.

title: Klarna Teams With Stripe’s Privy to Build Crypto Wallet ‘For the Masses’
contentSnippet: Swedish fintech firm Klarna is working towards the launch of its own crypto wallet with Stripe-owned wallet infrastructure firm, Privy.

title: El Salvador Partners with Elon Musk’s Grok in AI-Powered Education for 1M Students
contentSnippet: The nation that first adopted bitcoin as legal tender is looking to pioneer AI-powered education in 5,000 Salvadoran schools with xAI’s Grok

title: Multicoin joins as lead investor in LI.FI’s $29 million Series A extension round
contentSnippet: Launched in 2021, the universal liquidity layer and protocol intermediary has surpassed $60 billion in lifetime transaction volume.

title: Binance elevates Trump-backed World Liberty’s stablecoin by adding USD1 trading pairs
contentSnippet: The Abu Dhabi investment firm MGX chose USD1 when making a $2 billion investment into Binance, the world's largest crypto exchange.

title: Crypto Investment Firm Blockstream to Acquire TradFi Hedge Fund Corbiere Capital
contentSnippet: The planned deal will bring Corbiere’s equity and event-driven strategies under Blockstream’s asset management arm.

title: Robinhood Stock Slides 8% After Big Decline in November Trading Volumes
contentSnippet: Slumps across equity, options and crypto trading in November raised concerns that retail investor momentum may be fading.

title: Disney Targets Google Over AI Copyright Violations—Alongside $1 Billion OpenAI Deal
contentSnippet: Disney says Google’s AI used its characters without permission, as it signed a new deal with OpenAI to allow character generation with Sora.

title: Aptos Slumps 7% as Token Unlock Weighs on Sentiment
contentSnippet: Trading volumes jumped 38% above monthly averages as institutional players repositioned ahead of a scheduled token unlock.

title: TON Slips 3.3% to $1.59 as Broader Crypto Market Weakens
contentSnippet: The token is consolidating below resistance at $1.65, with support forming above $1.59, and traders are watching for a breakout above $1.70 to regain momentum.

title: ICP Extends Decline as Breakdown Below $3.40 Reinforces Bearish Structure
contentSnippet: ICP slid 4.28% as a sharp reversal from early highs pushed the token below short-term support, with volume surging during key inflection points.

title: Coinbase taps Chainlink CCIP to expand wrapped assets like cbBTC and cbXRP to new chains
contentSnippet: The U.S. crypto exchange chose Chainlink’s cross-chain interoperability standard as the “exclusive bridging solution” for its wrapped assets.

title: Anchorage snags another stablecoin issuance as it trumpets regulated status as market advantage
contentSnippet: The move follows Tether, in September, selecting Anchorage for issuing USAT, a stablecoin designed specifically for the U.S. market.

title: BNB Drops Below $865 as Crypto Market Moves Lower
contentSnippet: The token is now trading in a tight range, with buyers defending the $864-$867 zone and sellers capping gains near $868.50.

title: Save the Children Introduces Bitcoin Fund to Streamline Crisis Response
contentSnippet: New fund enables Save the Children to hold bitcoin, pilot digital wallets, and speed up emergency aid delivery.

title: Cross-Chain Liquidity Protocol LI.FI Raises $29M in Series A Extension
contentSnippet: The Berlin-based bridging and swap infrastructure provider has now raised $51.7M in total funding and processed more than $60B in onchain volume.

title: Some Bitcoin Buying Firms Are Selling as Losses Pile Up on Paper: Report
contentSnippet: A report found that most Bitcoin-stacking firms sit on unrealized losses, with a handful selling the asset as its price fell last month.

title: New XRP ETF hits the market with launch of 21Shares’ TOXR
contentSnippet: A new XRP exchange-traded fund is on the block — 21Shares debuted its fund on the CBOE exchange with the ticker symbol TOXR.

title: Nexo acquires Buenbit to anchor regulated push into Latin America’s growing crypto market
contentSnippet: Nexo’s acquisition of Buenbit marks a significant regional bet for the firm, which claims to manage $11 billion in assets.

title: Binance API update hints at stock perpetual contracts as exchanges eye TradFi markets
contentSnippet: Binance added a new API endpoint for signing a “TradFi-Perps agreement contract,” signaling early work for potential stock perpetual futures.

title: Spanish Police Dismantle Network Linked to Crypto ‘Wrench Attack’ Murder
contentSnippet: Five people have been arrested following a murder and kidnapping in April, with another four charged in Denmark.

title: Coinbase Ending USDC Rewards for Free Users, Will Only Be for Paid Members
contentSnippet: Not all Coinbase users will be able to earn rewards on USDC holdings, as the exchange moves to make it a feature for Coinbase One members.

title: Klarna furthers Stripe links, tapping Privy to explore potential crypto wallet after Tempo-based stablecoin foray
contentSnippet: The initiative remains exploratory, with any product launch dependent on securing required regulatory approvals, the firm said.

title: Crypto Is Now Central to Venezuela’s Economy—And Poses Sanctions Risks: TRM
contentSnippet: An informal peer-to-peer crypto economy is now central to Venezuela’s economy, and should be considered as President Trump ratchets up tensions with the country, a new TRM report says.

title: Binance launches private IOI feature for large spot and loan orders via OTC desk
contentSnippet: Binance has launched a private indication of interest feature for large spot and loan orders, saying it is the first crypto exchange to do so.

title: Spot trading rollout opens dYdX to US-based traders for first time, starting with Solana
contentSnippet: While its perpetual contracts remain unavailable to U.S. traders, dYdX Labs said it will track regulatory developments from the SEC and CFTC.

title: US DoJ Indicts Ukrainian Over Russia-Linked Cyberattack Groups That Paid in Crypto
contentSnippet: The individual was allegedly involved in two groups that used Telegram to claim credit for attacks against infrastructure targets in the U.S.

title: Morning Minute: VanEck Leans Into 'Degen' Culture with New ETF
contentSnippet: A basket of assets built around millennial finance, the gig economy and digital gambling has been built into this degen index.

title: New Xiaomi Smartphones Will Come With Sei Crypto Wallets Preinstalled
contentSnippet: The partnership will see a Sei “crypto wallet and discovery app” preinstalled on devices sold outside mainland China and the U.S.

title: Here’s Why Bitcoin Is Falling Despite the Fed's Rate Cut
contentSnippet: Analysts say the Fed’s rate cut was priced in, driving Bitcoin lower as risks like sticky inflation and the 2026 election cycle mount.

title: NFT winter deepens: Monthly sales hit lowest point of the year
contentSnippet: NFT sales fell to $320 million in November — their lowest this year — with early December off to a weak start as top collections slide across the board.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.
